comment: The main content area containing Chinese characters in seal script and explanatory text in regular script, arranged vertically in columns. The text appears to be from a classical Chinese dictionary or linguistic work, possibly the 'Shuowen Jiezi' (说文解字), given the style and structure. The left margin includes vertical annotations such as '大卅一', '说文七上', '上四', and '陳玉', indicating volume, section, page, and perhaps author or editor.
